title: The Journal of Applied Bacteriology

preceded-by.note: Proceedings of the Society for Applied Bacteriology

additional-note: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Penn's catalog record for this journal notes a New York as well an Oxford publisher location.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
